Package org.skistation.controllers

Class WorkerController

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.controllers.WorkerController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/workers") public class WorkerController extends Object
Controller for managing workers. It is responsible for handling requests related to workers.

    Constructs a new WorkerController with the specified worker service.

    • WorkerController

      public WorkerController(WorkerService workerService)

  • Method Details

    • getAllWorkers

      @GetMapping("") public List<Worker> getAllWorkers()
      Gets all workers.
      Returns:
      a list of all workers.

    • getWorkerById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Worker getWorkerById(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Gets a worker by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the worker.
      Returns:
      the worker with the specified ID, or null if no such worker exists.

    • getWorkerByEmail

      @GetMapping("/{email}") public Worker getWorkerByEmail(@PathVariable("email") String email)
      Gets a worker by email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the worker.
      Returns:
      the worker with the specified email, or null if no such worker exists.

    • getWorkerByPhone

      @GetMapping("/{phone}") public Worker getWorkerByPhone(@PathVariable("phone") Integer phone)
      Gets a worker by phone.
      Parameters:
      phone - the phone number of the worker.
      Returns:
      the worker with the specified phone number, or null if no such worker exists.

    • addWorker

      @PostMapping("/addWorker") public String addWorker(@RequestBody Worker worker)
      Adds a new worker.
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker to add.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the workers page.

    • deleteWorker

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public String deleteWorker(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Deletes a worker.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the worker to delete.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the workers page.
